title: Trade my E 90-1 Cy Young toward your lower grade, Red Potrait Cobb?
author: Belfast1933

posts.post_title: Trade my E 90-1 Cy Young toward your lower grade, Red Potrait Cobb?
posts.post_content:
Looking to land my white whale for my personal collection - I’d love to add a nice eye appeal, but lower grade is OK T206 Red Potrait Ty Cobb to my HOF collection. 

I’d love to package a trade plus cash for the right Cobb - I have this American Caramel card that I could include in the package toward the right Cobb. The Young has rough damage to the back (assume it was scrap booked and removed?) but the card front is super sweet (in my opinion!)

Love to hear from you - I have other HOFers I could add to a deal. 

Let’s talk!

Thx

Jeff

A couple of folks have asked so I thought I would post here.. yes, I am open to offers for an outright sale if not a partial trade for a Cobb

I have a few offers but nothing quite right yet. 

Let me know if you’d like more images, have any questions, etc. 

Thx,

Jeff
